name: d3plus-text
description: SVG text functions, including line wrapping with automatic font scaling.

scripts.dev: npm run serve & nodemon --watch src/ -x "npm run pretest"
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run docs && npm run min && npm run zip
scripts.test: npm run serve & eslint index.js src/* && casperjs test ./test/browser/*.js && killall node
scripts.zip: rm -f build/d3plus-text.zip && zip -j build/d3plus-text.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3plus-text.js build/d3plus-text.min.js
